description:
A complete set of cables, including housings and caps for SIS shifters.

  • Outer housing is 4mm diameter. 2, 600mm, 1, 340mm, and 2, 300mm
  • Inner cable is 1.2mm. 2, 2100mm
  • 3 sealed outer caps with traditional ferrules
  • 2 inner cable end caps
name: Shimano Deore SIS-SP41 Shift Inner/Outer Cable Set
